Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary; penitence
_description: A prayer of penitence to the Virgin Mary — five 10-line stanzas

BodDig2.First Lines:
Hayl marihit am sori haf pite of me and mercimi
                    leuedi to þe i cri for mi sinnis dred ham hi…
BodDig2.Last Lines:
…we sal haf ned þarea pan mari to calle &
                    c
